analyzed: dam tshig spyod ba nges ba ni

analyzed: mi smra ba dang mi byed nyid

analyzed: spa ba dang ni de bzhin mchod

analyzed: dam tshig tu ni yongs su grags

analyzed: ci jig mi byed zhe na ni

analyzed: ci jig spa ba byed zhe na
